name: Tank Factory War
description:
-More of a prototype than anything else, but it is playable.

-About the game:
(you can watch a 2.5min devlog on my yt  if you prefer)

TFW is a military RTS. Build and deploy you army and defenses strategically, in order to defend your base and expand while playing on multiple types of maps, with different game mechanics, facing incoming waves of enemies.

I'm not sure if I'll ever return to this project. It started as a small idea that really grew a lot pretty quickly. I feel like it would take way too long, especially for a game dev n00b like myself.
